doc:
Paul Schneider (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Schneider_(actor) 0 Paul Andrew Schneider (born March 16, 1976) is an American actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Dick Liddil in The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford (2007) alongside Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Rockwell and Jeremy Renner, and his role as Mark Brendanawicz on the first two seasons of the NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation. He won a Best Actor in a Narrative Feature award at the 2014 Tribeca Film Festival for his performance in Angus Maclachlan's Goodbye to All That and the Best Supporting Actor Award from the National Society of Film Critics for his performance as Charles Armitage Brown in Bright Star. Paul_Andrew_Schneider ( born March_16_,_1976 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_portrayal of Dick_Liddil in The_Assassination of Jesse_James by the_Coward_Robert_Ford ( 2007_) alongside Brad_Pitt , Casey_Affleck , Sam_Rockwell and Jeremy_Renner , and his_role as Mark_Brendanawicz on the_first_two_seasons of the_NBC_sitcom_Parks_and_Recreation . He won a_Best_Actor in a_Narrative_Feature_award at the_2014_Tribeca_Film_Festival for his_performance in Angus_Maclachlan 's_Goodbye to All_That and the_Best_Supporting_Actor_Award from the_National_Society of Film_Critics for his_performance as Charles_Armitage_Brown in Bright_Star .
